explains: adj. 管弦乐的；管弦乐队的

sentences.cn: 这个管弦乐团的演奏棒极了。

sentences.en: I had written quite a lot of orchestral music in my student days.
sentences.cn: 我在学生时代创作了许多管弦乐曲。

sentences.en: To be sure, he performs an impressive variety of interesting compositions, but it is not necessary for me to visit Avery Fisher Hall, or anywhere else, to hear interesting orchestral music.
sentences.cn: 当然，他演奏了多种多样令人印象深刻的有趣的作品，但我并没有必要去艾弗里·费舍尔音乐厅或其他其它地方听一场有趣的交响乐演出。
